Uses of Interface
io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api.RhymeLinkBuilder

    • Uses of RhymeLinkBuilder in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api

      Methods in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api that return RhymeLinkBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RhymeLinkBuilder UrlFingerprinting.createLinkWith(org.springframework.hateoas.server.mvc.WebMvcLinkBuilder linkBuilder)
      Creates a RhymeLinkBuilder that generates the URL to a controller method and adds the additional URL fingerprinting parameters
      RhymeLinkBuilder RhymeLinkBuilder.withName(String name) 
      RhymeLinkBuilder RhymeLinkBuilder.withoutFingerprint()
      Allows to disable the addition of fingerprinting parameters only for the link that is currently being built
      RhymeLinkBuilder RhymeLinkBuilder.withTemplateTitle(String title)
      Used to set a different title attribute only if the generated link contains URI template variables
      RhymeLinkBuilder RhymeLinkBuilder.withTemplateVariables(String... names)
      Ensures that a link template is generated that contains query parameter variables with all the given names.
      RhymeLinkBuilder RhymeLinkBuilder.withTitle(String title)
